actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to give ministers and Christian Science practitioners who previously elected to be exempt from coverage under the social security program an opportunity to revoke such exemption and upon payment of the requisite taxes, to obtain such coverage for the period the exemption was in effect.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Sets forth procedures by which ministers and Christian Science practitioners who have exempted themselves, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, from old age and disability Social Security coverage, may revoke their exemptions and obtain coverage for the exempted period upon payment of the requisite taxes.

titles.title: A bill to give ministers and Christian Science practitioners who previously elected to be exempt from coverage under the social security program an opportunity to revoke such exemption and upon payment of the requisite taxes, to obtain such coverage for the period the exemption was in effect.
